name: The Mercenary
description:
You are a mercenary.

After delivering a random item to the NPC, you need to defeat a random boss with a random weapon.

It's not going to be easy. You may come across a completely absurd weapon, such as a snowball. And with this weapon you will have to defeat, for example, a dragon.

Upgrade your character, improve his trading skills and buy various potions.

Try to defeat all the bosses in this game!
